name: Unfinished Marriage Story
description:
Help the two parents push forward there kid in life with there chain of love!

Game is made for GMTK GameJam 2021.

This was my first ever gamejam and started using Gamemaker Studio 2 (and programming) one week before the jam.
Unfortunately I couldn't set up the chain mechanic and have not received any answer to what is wrong with my code neither on GMTK #game-jam-tech-help, Gamemaker #help_ Discord channels and on Yoyo Games's forum.

I have uploaded the game even in this state, because I wanted to show that if not much, but I could accomplished at least something (even just for myself).

Greenlands by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com

Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Home Sweet Home by FSM Team feat. Sandhwani | https://www.free-stock-music.com/artist.fsm-team.html
